name: Jinzo - Jector
effectText: This card's name becomes "Jinzo" while on the field or in the GY. You can Tribute this card; add 1 "Jinzo" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Jinzo - Jector", then reveal all Set cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zones, and if there are Traps among them, you can Special Summon "Jinzo" monsters from your hand, up to the number of Traps revealed. You can only use this effect of "Jinzo - Jector" once per turn.
